metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45463 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: load_cache in GEGL before 0.4.34 allows shell expansion when a pathname in a constructed command line is not escaped or filtered. This is caused by use of the system library function for execution of the ImageMagick convert fallback in magick-load. NOTE: GEGL releases before 0.4.34 are used in GIMP releases before 2.10.30; however, this does not imply that GIMP builds enable the vulnerable feature.

criterions.comment: gegl package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
